title: Perform Test Method Validation
description: A newly authored analytical test method must be validated to prove it is accurate, precise, and robust before it can be used for QC testing.

tasks.description: Create a validation protocol document outlining the experiments to be performed (e.g., accuracy, precision, linearity).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent authors a formal protocol for the validation study.

tasks.description: Execute the experiments as per the protocol and record all results.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst performs the required lab work and documents the outcomes.

tasks.description: Analyze the results, confirm they meet all acceptance criteria, and write a final validation report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent analyzes the data, confirms the method is valid, and authors the final summary report.
